txt.en:
'Ho! The 'goblins' have returned to Wistmead!

'I thought we had driven the last of them back to Mount Gram, but it seems the draw of the Harvest Festival has proven too great!

'Will you take up this club and send them flying out of the Shire?'

Goblin-gourds can be found throughout Wistmead.\n\nHalinard Bunce has helped carve a number of spooky goblin-gourds for the Harvest Festival. You should participate in the spirit of Bandobras Took and send the goblin-gourds flying!

'Ah! Old Golfimbul must have felt quite the shock when Bandobras the Bullroarer swung his club! Don't you think?\n\n'I'll have more gourds carved soon enough. I must say I much prefer these to actual goblins!'
Halinard Bunce can be found in Wistmead.\n\nYou have sent a number of goblin-gourds flying in Wistmead and should now return to Halinard Bunce.

'Ah! Old Golfimbul must have felt quite the shock when Bandobras the Bullroarer swung his club! Don't you think?\n\n'I'll have more gourds carved soon enough. I must say I much prefer these to actual goblins!'
There are few hobbits who do not know the tale of Bandobras Took's triumph over the goblin, Golfimbul.
